A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Quite simply the worst of all of the Star Wars films. A disgusting mess with no respect for the lore set behind it\, exposes the film behind the fantasy and pulls you completely out of the viewing experience. Also filled with nonsense Social Justice moments and awkward\, hastily written scenes that make no sense going from one to another. \n\nA Travesty of modern film making.
